# file

**Instance Property**

The file wrapper containing the document content.

## Declaration

```swift
let file: FileWrapper
```

## Reading the content

- **contentType**: The expected uniform type of the file contents.

items.description: The expected uniform type of the file contents.
items.name: contentType
